sentences.english: Reservationist(R):Fortune Hotel. Reservationist. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 财富酒店。总台我能帮你吗？

sentences.english: To check in, you should at first go to the reception desk to register.
sentences.chinese: 要入住的话，你应当首先去总台登记。

sentences.english: Assist in taking room reservations, if a guest approached the desk or calls up.
sentences.chinese: 如果客人路过总台或打电话预订房间，要帮助客人。

sentences.english: Let me show you to the Front Desk.
For the convenience of booking your room, please contact the reception desk.
sentences.chinese: 为方便您预定房间，请与总台联系。

sentences.english: If you have something valuable, please deposit it in the safe at the Front Desk.
sentences.chinese: 如有贵重物品，请存放在总台的贵重物品保险箱内。

sentences.english: The reception desk is ahead, this way please.
sentences.chinese: 总台就在前面，请往这边走。

sentences.english: Please contact the Front Desk for extension or later-check out.
sentences.chinese: 如需续住或延迟退房，请主动前往总台办理有关手续。

sentences.english: Works closely with the Front Desk staff to ensure a smooth check in.
sentences.chinese: 同总台员工密切合作以确保客人入住顺畅。

sentences.english: XX hotel, front desk. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: XX酒店，总台，我能帮你什么吗？

sentences.english: Mr. smith arrives at a hotel. He goes to the receptionist's desk .
sentences.chinese: 密斯史先生来到一家宾馆，他走到服务总台。

sentences.english: Please return your room card to the Cashier Desk when you check out.
sentences.chinese: 当离店时，请务必将门卡归还总台收银处。

definition: stage/proscenium/foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.)/front desk/reception desk/(computing) front-end/foreground
